import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import Calendar from '../components/Calendar' import "../styles/tables.css" const Homepage = ({ type }) => { const [month, setMonth] = useState(new Date().getMonth()+1); const [year, setYear] = useState(new Date().getFullYear()); const defaultMonth = new Date().getMonth()+1; const defaultYear = new Date().getFullYear(); const dateChange = (e) => { console.log(e) if (e.target.id === "month") setMonth(document.getElementById('month').value); else setYear(document.getElementById('year').value); } console.log(month); return (

Calendar

defaultYear)? month :defaultMonth} year={(Number.isInteger(year) && year>defaultYear)? year :defaultMonth} />
) } export default Homepage
